content: keep yourself cosy on blustery windy days with the stormborn wrap the large oversized triangle is worked from the centre out to create a drapey and cosy scarf this design varies basic stitch techniques bobbles and mesh so that this project has enough variety to keep you interested all throughout the pattern the sleek and modern design is topped with large chunky tassels for a touch of whimsy sizes one size skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
